content.para: The 3.1.1 release introduces a number of performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

tr.td: Release 3.1.1 improves the internal cache behaviour (CARROT-571) and lowers the default number of processing threads in the Document Clustering Server (CARROT-581).
Release 3.1.1 of comes with the 2.9.1 version of Lucene.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.1.1. For more new features, please see release 3.1.0 and release 3.0 notes.
